definition: notice or announcement/list of names/public roll of successful examinees
head/chief/first (occasion, thing etc)/classifier for poems, songs etc

sentences.chinese: 他的書登上了暢銷榜首。

sentences.english: He topped the list in this appraisal of science and research.
sentences.chinese: 這次科研評比，他高居榜首。

sentences.english: Ruffles top our list of favorite summer fashion trends.
sentences.chinese: 褶邊佔據了夏季流行趨勢清單的榜首。

sentences.english: The country's 21% unemployment rate is the highest in the EU.
sentences.chinese: 這個國家21%的失業率在歐盟高據榜首。

sentences.english: Porto currently stand five points clear at the top of their domestic league.
sentences.chinese: 波爾圖目前在國內聯賽以五分優勢排在榜首。

sentences.english: Leader AS Roma stayed provisionally six points clear at the top of the Italian Serie A.
sentences.chinese: 意大利甲組聯賽榜首的羅馬暫時領先次席隊伍六分。

sentences.english: Joyride topped the US chart in spring 1991.
sentences.chinese: 專輯《逍遙遊》於1991年春榮登美國排行榜榜首。

sentences.english: In the United States four of the best table in red grapes topped the list.
sentences.chinese: 在美國四種最好的佐餐紅葡萄中名列榜首。

sentences.english: This is the chart-topping record opf this week.
sentences.chinese: 這是本週最暢銷流行音樂唱片名列榜首的唱片。

sentences.english: Pakistan tops the list, but in the context of very low bank penetration.
sentences.chinese: 巴基斯坦位列榜首，但是很少銀行進入這一地區。

sentences.english: The table is led by Fernando Alonso with 96 points.
sentences.chinese: 而阿隆索仍以96分的成績踞於榜首。

sentences.english: The University of Southern California leads the way with 8, 615 international students.
sentences.chinese: 南加州大學以8615名留學生佔據榜首。

sentences.english: China is still leading the Olympics 2008 gold medal tally race with 17 golds.
sentences.chinese: 中國隊目前仍以17塊金牌高居金牌榜榜首。

sentences.english: The song has topped the pop charts for five weeks.
sentences.chinese: 這首歌連續五個星期雄踞流行榜榜首。

sentences.english: This time female celebrity Haruka Ayase successfully won first place.
sentences.chinese: 這次由女星綾瀨遙順利奪下榜首。

sentences.english: The challenge for Apple now is finding a formula for staying on top.
sentences.chinese: 現在，蘋果的挑戰就是要找到穩居榜首的方案。

definition: to stand above/to occupy an important position/to rank (among the top few)
to take the lead in a race/to set the pace
notice or announcement/list of names/public roll of successful examinees
to continue in a post/(to hold a post) several times in succession/(to win a title) in successive years/to stay at number one/to defend a championship
a long way in front/to lead by a wide margin
ranking/ordered list/top 20/roll of honor/to come nth out of 100
table of scores (in exams or sports league)
to rank (number 1, or third last etc)/to be among (those who are in a particular group)
